name: Pendleton Pig
description:
You must resque your friend Peater Pot. To do this you must use the enemys powers againt them.

Menu

  • w - up
  • s - down
  • space - select

game

  • wasd - move
  • e - swamp attack
  • f - interact
  • space - attack

This game was made for the Low Res Jam 2022.
